doc: yuzu installer does not work with a VPN or proxy
Please keep in mind yuzu is EXPERIMENTAL SOFTWARE.
When submitting an issue, please do the following:
- Provide the version (commit hash) of yuzu you are using.
- Provide sufficient detail for the issue to be reproduced.
- For graphical issues, comparison screenshots with real hardware.
- For emulation inaccuracies, a test-case (if able).

So that's it.. I have always believed that the installer won't work behind a proxy, but was pretty surprised when I found that it cannot work with VPN connected either. The VPN I'm using is a simple L2TP connection, and yuzu installer won't open with it connected. Instead, a "Web navigation cancelled" message is shown, and if I refresh the page, it shows the common IE error "Cannot open this page" instead. When a proxy is connected, I get the same message.

I'm not sure if this can be fixed, but I believe this is something that deserves to be considered an issue. As this installer has become official, I decided to open an issue here so that it doesn't get ignored. (actually should probably have opened it in j-selby/liftinstall instead...)
